extendedInfo.description: TileStorm by Massive Hadron is here for Android so you can find out for yourself why this game was a hit on iPhone/iOS and has been compared to Angry Birds for it's huge amount addictive and challenging gameplay.100 unique puzzles and tens of hours of gameplay await you to tax your mental agility and lateral thinking. More fun than brain training with guaranteed satisfaction as you travel across four environments beautifully detailed in full 3D. The aim of TileStorm is to solve a series of puzzles enabling 'Eggbot' the robot to make his way through each respective level to the exit. The first puzzles are similar in appearance and strategy to traditional sliding puzzle games, but later players will encounter tiles with completely different properties, maps with multiple solutions, and levels requiring the re-use of certain tiles. Not all tiles can be moved and some can only be moved in certain directions - look for the visual clues to help you solve the puzzle. TileStorm is guaranteed to present a challenge to anyone that plays it and it will require real skill and mental dexterity to complete. Features include:- 100 challenging maps of generally increasing difficulty- 4 beautiful themes including Industrial, Egypt, Medieval and Jungle- 5 great tunes - classic game tracks for each theme and the menus- Player statistics stored under options menu including combined playing time and number of screen presses- Individual level times stored - go back and try to beat your fastest time- Tap the in-game timer to restart or surrender any given level.- App2sd* IF YOU HAVE LICENSING ISSUES, PLEASE UNINSTALL AND REINSTALL USING THE MARKET APP ON YOUR DEVICE *Please email us with questions or feedback. Try our other awesome HD & 3D Games. Whether you want a puzzle, arcade, action, strategy or casual game, we've something entertaining for you:* In TileStorm Eire highly addictive puzzles of path construction against the clock are great brain training as you guide Eggbot through a jungle of challenges. Pocket gold coins as you need to slide the tiles to guide our robo hero from spire to castle on an Irish adventure in another beautiful brain teaser. Or bag a jewel or two in TileStorm Polar in a super new Tile Storm story. [Massive Hadron]* Fight for survival over a night in the city with a gun & torch as your only defense (defence) against an angry zombie hoard in Aftermath XHD. Attack or run? It's your choice. [Two Heads]* Glide through the air like a paper plane (or the birds!) as you race flying at high speed from tower to tower in Ground Effect Pro X HD. Enjoy virtual physics, acceleromoter control and stereoscopic 3D. [Glenn Corpes]* Be truly challenged by Denki Blocks! Deluxe which The Sunday Times called âa Tetris for the 21st century"* Slice, dice, cut, chop, pop and flick blobs of color goo in Mixt. Includes bonus MP3 music track by DJ Shur-i-kan to enjoy as you mix the bubbles of coloured paint [Uprising]* Fun for kids and all the family alike. Farm fruit in Frootrees as you flick, throw and toss the Froot to harvest them using your poker skills to balance risk & reward. Just a hint of south park. Or try the Freaky Halloween Edition [Tin Man]* Shave face like never before in Magnetic Shaving Derby [Brandon Williamson]* For sports fans, check out Big Cup Cricket and Big Hit Baseball FREE from our friends at Beautiful Game Studios.Small Print: VAT added if bought within EU. Game may require license from Google and collect anonymous stats for quality purposes. If u get error "Unknown reason -18", please email us or google for solution. Dev tested on devices from HTC, Samsung, Motorola, Sony Ericsson incl Xperia Play, Droid, Galaxy & Desire Z.

reviews.title: Nice time waster
reviews.comment: Nice little time waster! The levels range from very easy to mind numbingly hard. It *is* possible to play this game without data being connected.... I do all the time on the train. Every once in a while the games needs a connection to verify the licence. Let it connect then disable data.
reviews.author: Brent Singers

reviews.title: I used to allow my son to play offline
reviews.comment: Now most apps require being connected via wifi/3G/4G just to use them. Google must be suggesting these permissions that seem to be adopted by more & more developers. AdMob seems to be running constantly on our devices, contributing to their search engine. I enjoy JB & ICS, which like iOS 6.1, allows users to opt out of notifications, but games play without having to be connected on iOS. Yet we\'re spied upon & spammed 24/7 on Android. Remember the days when they gave out free phones to get money for service?
reviews.author: James von Veit

reviews.title: Great mind game.
reviews.comment: Makes you think !
reviews.author: Mark S Brown

reviews.title: Warning the now does NOT work offline
reviews.comment: This is my 6year old daughters favourite app, as she is 6, I have internet access turned off for her.  This app is now useless. One star until it can be used offline
reviews.author: NoTo WantToUseG

reviews.title: Eddie
reviews.comment: Great application and fun The only down side is how much space it takes
reviews.author: heriberto hernandez

reviews.title: Really good game
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game which I\'ve had for a long time and I\'m not much into games but this one of the few that I like.
reviews.author: Terry King

reviews.title: Great game love it
reviews.comment: Great way to keep the mind active on long nights at work.
reviews.author: John Dignam

reviews.title: Unplayable
reviews.comment: Nothing but corrupted graphics on the RAZR HD Maxx.
reviews.author: Bill MacBean

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: But hard
reviews.author: WESAM AL-Hassan

reviews.title: Lovely game
reviews.comment: Really nice. Smooth, challenging, rewarding.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on Epic 4G Touch --
reviews.comment: Works for a little while after uninstall/re-install, then starts crashing (force close on launch).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: No instructions On how to move the bot or puzzle pieces.  Maybe it\'s broken on sgs2.  Lame that this costs money without controls directions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice that it\'s challenging
reviews.comment: yet i would suggest adding more interactivity to the controls, like highlighting metal floor conveyors upon touch/movement. would help to understand what is going on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Black screen and nothing else on my CDMA HTC Hero + CM7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paid version has ads
reviews.comment: I paid for this app and it still has ads. What a waste. When the ad pops up you must choose one of their options. Back and the menu button are disabled. To bad they weren\'t disabled during game play, at least this way my kid wouldn\'t be able to leave the game and mess around on my phone. Game play becomes repetitive after 4th level
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Optimus
reviews.comment: Same here! stuck @ jungle 10! rest all completed long bck... :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Can make you think but during later levels. Some bugs - does not lead to next automatically. Otherwise nice graphics and levels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard!
reviews.comment: Even in easy mode, this game is hard. Actually i could not find any difference between easy and hard modes. There should be hints, even a way to see the fully solved map, i think. Levels should also be grouped like most other games do, it\'s hard to navigate .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 3D sliding puzzle game. I\'ll be showing this to my baby girl. She will absolutely love this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great game. Excellent graphics.Runs perfectly on HTC Incredible.  Pls add ability to move to SD card, if it\'s feasible.
reviews.author: A Google User
